description: The backcountry is beautiful and liberating, rugged and unforgiving. The right kit gives you the confidence, comfort, and freedom to safely experience it all. The Rush Bib is a core component. Ultradurable 3L GORE-TEX PRO 2.0 with Most Rugged Technology delivers breathable storm protection, and the softshell bib extends protection, stretches, and has two secure pockets. The TouringCuff™ simplifies buckle management, a RECCO® reflector can aid search and rescue, and thigh vents cool you off on the uptracks.
name: Arcteryx Rush Bib, Reg - Mens

specs.value: 70D plain weave, 100% Nylon face - bluesign Approved Material
